name: Tough Guyz
overview: A SEUCK based shooter created by Henk Nieborg and published in 1991. It has the feel of Commando about it. You must break through the hostile landscape and rescue your mates. Two players may play cooperatively. This game, despite what some incorrect spelling on some media might lead you to believe was never released by CP Verlag. That was a version of the Tough Guys fighting game, not a this shooter.
